name: SFAuthenticationSession
desc: A class that manages sharing a one-time login between Safari and an app, which can also be used for automatic login for associated apps.DeprecatedUse ASWebAuthenticationSession instead.

items.name: typealias SFAuthenticationSession.CompletionHandler
items.desc: The completion handler for an authentication session when the user cancels or finishes the login.

items.name: init(url: URL, callbackURLScheme: String?, completionHandler: SFAuthenticationSession.CompletionHandler)
items.desc: Initializes the SFAuthenticationSession in an application.

items.name: func cancel()
items.desc: Cancels the currently running session when the consent dialog is up or when the webpage is up. This is how applications stop the login process.

items.name: func start() -> Bool
items.desc: Starts the session after initializing an instance of SFAuthenticationSession. This will trigger the consent dialog.
